features: 1.7-ounce container of Aveeno Calm + Restore Fragrance-Free Oat Gel Facial Moisturizer for sensitive skin with Prebiotic Oat & calming feverfew, to instantly sooth & replenish skin's moisture barrier

Aveeno Calm + Restore designed for sensitive skin with prebiotic oat, goes beyond soothing to strengthen skin's moisture barrier. The hydrating daily facial moisturizer provides 24-hour moisture that leaves skin comfortable all day long

The lightweight, fast-absorbing formula contains prebiotic oat, to soothe skin, & feverfew, effectively helps calm irritated, dry skin. 97% noted skin feels less irritated, more tolerant & comfortable all day
Ideal for sensitive skin & eczematic skin, the gentle daily hypoallergenic face moisturizer is free of fragrances, parabens, alcohol, dye & phthalates & is non-comedogenic, so it won't clog pores
From a dermatologist-recommended brand for over 70 years, Aveeno Calm + Restore Oat Gel Moisturizer is gentle & effective for the most sensitive skin* *(Atopic/Eczematic skin)
body.description: Hydrate your sensitive, irritated, dry skin with Aveeno Calm + Restore Oat Gel Facial Moisturizer. Tested to be gentle on sensitive skin, the gentle oat gel moisturizer instantly soothes & replenishes skin moisture barrier. Aveeno Calm + Restore designed for sensitive skin with prebiotic oat, goes beyond soothing to strengthen skin's moisture barrier. The lightweight hydrating gel cream continues to moisturize for 24 hours so even sensitive skin feels comfortable all day. The hypoallergenic cream with prebiotic oat helps soothe dryness & nourishes skin's natural moisture barrier while feverfew calms & 97% noted skin feels less irritated, more tolerant & comfortable all day. The fast-absorbing, non-comedogenic formula is free of fragrances, parabens, alcohol, dyes & phthalates & leaves skin feeling soft & supple. This soothing moisturizer is gentle & effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Found THE face “lotion” of my dreams!
reviews.reviewText: ***TIP: Buy a travel size cosmetic/lotion pump to put this in so that you don’t have to stick your fingers in it!***I am not a big fan of regular lotions at all, but living in Colorado makes my skin dry quickly and easily. I read the reviews on this a few times in different places and put it in my cart for months. It went on sale so I figured it must be the time to finally get it and I am so glad I did. The texture is great and it soaks in so fast and leaves no weird feeling afterwards at all. It just feels like my face but not dry! And there’s no scent or anything that irritates my skin either. I’ve been telling people about it for a few days now, it is that good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cold and soothing
reviews.reviewText: If I could give this 10 stars I would. This is the best facial moisturizer I have ever used and I have tried tons of them. Including several that cost way more than this one. I love the way this feels on my skin. It is really soothing. Plus, the gel texture makes it stay cold so it is super soothing for puffy morning skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non-greasy, nicely moisturizing and no obnoxious smell.
reviews.reviewText: I love this moisturizer. I've been using it for a few months and my dermatologist remarked how nice my skin looked on my last visit. It is a bit more "gloppy" than some moisturizers, which I like because it goes on so smoothly and feels kind of silky. Absorbs well and has little scent which is great because I easily get headaches from scented products. My face doesn't feel greasy or coated after applying which is a big plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good for sensitive skin, recommend
reviews.reviewText: let me start with dislike what I dislike about this is the fact it makes my skin feel sticky when I put it on later on I don't feel it but still, now I do like this 1. I have sensitive skin and it feels good on my skin, 2. it does moisturizes my skin and a little goes a long way. 3. my skin feels much better now with the aveeno skin care set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and soothing
reviews.reviewText: I've been trying out new face lotions for a while now, really looking for one that was light but super moisturizing. I decided to give this one a chance after reading the reviews, and I'm so glad I did! A little bit goes a long way, and it feels so silky going on. I don't have particularly sensitive skin so I can't attest to that, but it feels great going on and I can't imagine it being irritating at all. The smell is also super mild which I really like as sometimes scents can trigger headaches for me.Just for reference, I have combination skin (on the dry side lately due to cold weather) and am not prone to acne.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing, smooth, and cool
reviews.reviewText: I use this when my skin feels extra dry. It's always refreshing cool and and makes my skin happy and smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect face lotion for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for sensitive skin its very light, a small amount covers my face and neck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great product, awful packaging.
reviews.reviewText: Why do brands insist on putting things in jars? This formula is great, but the bacteria breeding ground that the packaging creates is awful. Put this in a tube or a pump and I’ll come back to it.Also, I honestly think it’s a little overpriced for the volume of product. It’s a very good moisturizer, but not a great value

reviews.reviewerName: Good lotion that I often buy when finish usage. Really good in moisture of skin.
reviews.reviewTitle: Good facial cream for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: This facial cream is good as it is meant for sensitive skin and I can use it for my 5 yrs old son face too as his face some areas have dryness & will cause itch. After apply it, it helps a lot for his dry area and no more itchiness.

Fantastic product, really quickly absorbed and forms a perfect, lightweight yet sufficiently moisturizing protective barrier on the face. Very calming and soothing, suitable for the humid climate in Singapore too.

Great moisturiser! I got 10pcs when the price went down and just opened my 9th tub today. Sadly, it looks like it has been used before, seems like a return. I didn't bother checking all tubs because I trusted they were good. Opened the 10th tub and it looked perfect as were the last 8 I had. Maybe just bad luck.

Product came pretty beat up but it's okay considering the distance it had to travel. Ordered 30th Dec, arrived 11th Jan, earlier than the suggested 14th Jan receiving. Heard many good things about this cream from Dr. Dray and hope this works out for me.
The product arrived with the lid being half opened. Can see the grease on the cover. Totally disappointed!!
